oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Stable Seven-Membered Heterocycle, Containing B, C, N, O, and P Atoms, inside a Smaragdyrin Macrocycle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KALITA, H
LEE, WZ
THEOPHALL, GG
LAKSHMI, KV
RAVIKANTH, M
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: PHOSPHORUS
absorption
fluorescence
heterocycles
macrocycles
smaragdyrin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Unprecedented examples of smaragdyrin macrocycles containing seven membered heterocyclic rings were synthesized under simple reaction conditions in high yields. The heterocycle formed inside smaragdyrin macrocycle is rare example of heterocycle containing five different atoms, such as B, C, N, O, and P atoms. The mixed B-III and P-V complexes of smaragdyrin macrocycles showed new structural, spectral, and electrochemical properties.
